page.title: 20Morris Dancing In Redditch.
page.content: There are three morris teams in Redditch. The{"Paradise Islanders"}dance{"Border {Morris"}and their dances come from Worcestershire,{"White Hart"}is a{ {"Cotswold Morris"}team and{"Nancy {Butterfly,"}the only ladies' side in Redditch,dance{"North West Morris"} which includes dances from Lancashire and Cheshire.North west dances were orriginally done in carnival processions and were danced in clogs. "Nancy Butterfly" dance in{red,white {and blue}which are{traditional colours {and they wear red clogs.}The clogs have irons on the soles which make a lot of noise.The dancers use sticks,handkerchiefs{garlands and {slings.}The muscians play {melodeon,banjo accordian and bass {drum.
